text: Arthur William Green (5 December 1881 – 24 September 1966) was a Welsh professional footballer who made over 130 appearances as a centre forward in the Football League for Notts County. He also played league football for Nottingham Forest and Stockport County and was capped by Wales at international level. == International career == Green won eight caps and scored three goals for the Wales national team between 1901 and 1908. He was part of the 1906–07 British Home Championship-winning squad. == Personal life == Green served in the British Armed Forces during the First World War. == Honours == Nottingham Forest * Football League Second Division: 1906–07 Wales * British Home Championship: 1906–07 == Career statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |+Appearances and goals by club, season and competition ! rowspan="2" |Club ! rowspan="2" |Season ! colspan="3" |League ! colspan="2" |FA Cup ! colspan="2" |Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Swindon Town |1899–00 |Southern League First Division |4 |2 | colspan="2" |― |4 |2 |- | rowspan="4" |Nottingham Forest |1906–07 |Second Division |13 |6 |0 |0 |13 |6 |- |1907–08 | rowspan="2" |First Division |19 |8 |0 |0 |19 |8 |- |1908–09 |6 |3 |0 |0 |6 |3 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !38 !17 !0 !0 !38 !17 |- |Stockport County |1909–10 |Second Division |7 |1 |0 |0 |7 |1 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !49 !20 !0 !0 !20 !20 |} == References == Category:English Football League players Category:British military personnel of World War I Category:Nottingham Forest F.C. players Category:Welsh footballers Category:1881 births Category:1966 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Aberystwyth Category:Association football forwards Category:Wales international footballers Category:Southern Football League players Category:Aberystwyth Town F.C. players Category:Swindon Town F.C. players Category:Aston Villa F.C. players Category:Ebbw Vale F.C. players Category:Walsall F.C. players Category:Notts County F.C. players Category:Stockport County F.C. players Category:Brierley Hill Alliance F.C. players
